Special Powers
CONSTRUCT: FREE: If no Construct generated by Hal Jordan was on your force this turn, generate a Yellow Construct.

October 30, 2021
peeterparkker
The second best lantern chase from the set imo because of the boot. He moves 10, places boot 11, it hits 11 for 3 with giant reach 3 which is square 14. Next turn boot swings again and hal swings. Third turn boot uses colossal stamina and if it doesn’t succeed, it dies and hal can spit out another one (EDIT: next turn. Misread the power). And hal can reposition before it does. Repeat, rinse.
April 29, 2021
realasnic
So I don't think anyone loves the 10 attack, but considering he has an EE that drops attack -1, and damage -1, on HITTING not damaging, that is a pretty strong effect to me. Then add in the fact he also can do some damage and hit with the boot AND the fact that he is only 50 points (power creep?) any higher attack would result in him being more points and more $$$$. So I get it.
April 25, 2021
pokolo
Yeah starting 10/17 isn’t so great, I think he’s the least impressive of the Lantern chases... also pulse wave somewhere would have been nice since he’s the Yellow Lantern. No yellow powers at all. If u manage to somehow get him on that last click tho then nice... he’ll b a solid play in Bizarro dial formats.
